verbose_text: Rg1 significantly increased SA-beta-Gal and reduced CFU-Mix formation compared with the control group (p < 0.05), significantly down-regulated SIRT1 expression in CD34+ CD38- KG1alpha LSCs compared with the control group (p < 0.05), and significantly reduced TSC2 expression in CD34+ CD38- KG1alpha LSCs compared with the control group (p < 0.05).
